title: Band-e Amīr/Tukrash?
description: Archaeological survey and prospecting has identified Achaemenid-era buildings and embankments in the vicinity of the modern Iranian village of Band-e Amīr (Fars province). Sumner writes that this location might be identified with Tukrash, a settlement mentioned in surviving documents.

properties.title: OSM Location of modern village بندامیر

properties.description: representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 32541
